mean_cn: n. 影响，势力；  v. 影响
mean_en: the power to change or affect someone or something; the power to cause changes without directly forcing them to happen
word_etyma: in进入 + flu流动 + ence名词后缀 → 流入 → influence 影响
short_phrase: have influence on other other people
sentence: Stop smoking! It will have a bad influence on your kid.
sentence_trans: 别抽烟了！这会给孩子带来不良影响！
